posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a T206 Chief Myers (fielding) Piedmont 350 25 SGC 20 1.5 for $19.

Pm's, emails (cavelyon@aol.com) or posts, whichever is first to come across will be accepted.  

Paypal gift or payment owed is accepted as payment.

Please email with any questions before committing to buy.
